name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clifford HARDEN, Appellant

OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Improvidently Granted.

casebody.head_matter:
383 A.2d 522
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Clifford HARDEN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 16, 1976.
Decided Jan. 26, 1978.
Gerald J. Haas, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Eric B. Henson, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
